mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from document
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into document (doc_id, doc_name, doc_number, doc_date, doc_classes, doc_type, doc_urg, doc_src, doc_owner_id, doc_owner, doc_phone, doc_org, doc_dispunit, remark, doc_state, rel_time, sendim, sendinfo, tenant_id, create_date_time, update_date_time, doc_version ) values (#{docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{docClasses,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{docType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{docUrg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{docSrc,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{docOwnerId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{docOwner,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{docPhone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{docOrg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{docDispunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docState,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{relTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sendim,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sendinfo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDateTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateDateTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{docVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
